channel.title: Softlayer_notification_mobile on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_notification_mobile on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile Service Datatype Description SoftLayer Customers can use this service to view all of the available mobile notifications that can be subscribed to. No mobile notifications are required. Methods createSubscriberForMobileDevice Create a new subscriber for a given resource. getAllObjects Retrieve all Notifications that can be subscribed to. getObject Retrieve a SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile record. getPreferences Retrieve the preferences related to the notification.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile Datatype Description This is an extension of the SoftLayer_Notification class. These are implementation details specific to those notifications which can be subscribed to and received on a mobile device. Local id Unique identifier for the notification. Type: integer keyName Name that can be used by external systems to refer to a notification. Type: string name Friendly name for the notification.

item.title: SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile Service Datatype Description This is an extension of the SoftLayer_Notification class. These are implementation details specific to those notifications which can be subscribed to and received on a mobile device. Local id Unique identifier for the notification. Type: integer keyName Name that can be used by external systems to refer to a notification. Type: string name Friendly name for the notification.

item.title: createSubscriberForMobileDevice
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile::createSubscriberForMobileDevice Overview Create a new subscriber for a given resource. Parameters Name Type Description keyName string resourceTableId integer userRecordId integer Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers Return Values boolean

item.title: getAllObjects
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile::getAllObjects Overview Use this method to retrieve all active notifications that can be subscribed to. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Notification_MobileObjectMask SoftLayer_ObjectMask SoftLayer_Notification_MobileObjectFilter Return Values SoftLayer_Notification[]

item.title: getObject
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile::getObject Overview Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Notification_MobileInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Notification_MobileObjectMask SoftLayer_Notification_MobileObjectFilter SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile

item.title: getPreferences
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile::getPreferences Overview Retrieve the preferences related to the notification. These are preferences are configurable and optional for subscribers to use. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Notification_MobileInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Notification_MobileObjectMask SoftLayer_Notification_MobileObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Notification_Preference[]

item.title: getRequiredPreferences
item.description: SoftLayer_Notification_Mobile::getRequiredPreferences Overview Retrieve the required preferences related to the notification. While configurable, the subscriber does not have the option whether to use the preference. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers SoftLayer_Notification_MobileInitParameters authenticate Optional Headers SoftLayer_Notification_MobileObjectMask SoftLayer_Notification_MobileObjectFilter resultLimit SoftLayer_ObjectMask Return Values SoftLayer_Notification_Preference[]
